data.eml:eml: Diglotta mersa (Haliday) and Halobrecta flavipes Thomson, two new species for the Canadian fauna (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Aleocharinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jan Klimaszewski, Reginald Webster, Volker Assing, Karine Savard (2008): Diglotta mersa (Haliday) and Halobrecta flavipes Thomson, two new species for the Canadian fauna (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Aleocharinae). ZooKeys 2: 175-188, DOI: 10.3897/zookeys.2.18
